title: Hotel Security - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/19/19
itunes:title: Hotel Security - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/19/19
description:
George Noory, author Gary Grossman and former Marriott hotel executive Ed Fuller share their knowledge on security techniques used by hotels in high danger sites overseas, why terrorists choose to attack American hotels, and procedures hotels use to protect their guests.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
